education.description: Computer science student @42 School Paris. I have learned how awesome programming can be, through intensive C learning, with projects including a complete shell recreation, a 3d wireframe viewer, recoding shell built-in functions like 'ls' or 'cd', or algorithms solving sudokus and Tetris puzzles.
Scientific high school diploma, option Engineering Science.

testimonials.text: Mathias serious and flexible person. He can learn and adapt himself quickly to the provided tools, is relevant, and keeps an eye on our goals. Keep going!
